name: Tangle Pop
description:
General Description

Local Multiplayer Game for two players. The players are placed in an arena and have to survive against oncoming waves of monsters for as long as possible. They are connected by a wire, which they can utilize to kill (“pop”) Monsters by entangling them within it. The longer the game goes on, the more monsters appear.

The Gameplay is generally fast-paced and chaotic.

                                                                                                                                                                                   

Controls

Arrows, A, D, W, S or Gamepad
